about_the_game:
Search & Rescue
Search, Rescue, Survive! Turn-based Strategy Board Game for up to 4 Players! Local or Remote, Co-Op or Lone Wolf!
Search for Tourists lost during Extreme Wind and bring everyone to safety!
Hurry up, it`s getting colder with every minute!


Main Features
❆ Hex Board Game Turn-Based Strategy
❆ Magnificent Tatra National Park Main Board
❆ Yosemite National Park and more as DLCs
❆ Procedural Boards
❆ 1-4 Players - Single Player or Co-Operation
❆ Scenarios and Missions
❆ Local or Remote Multiplayer
❆ Survive Mode - Rescue Tourists or Survive
❆ Character Leveling
❆ Equipment and Upgrades
❆ Variety of Items, Cards and Fields
❆ Learn about Dangers of Mountain Environment and about Survival!



Did You know that "Halny" foehn wind can blow even 300km/h? It can lift You off the ground and throw down the slope!
Visibility is low, perceived temperature is low, snow, gravel or tree shards are flying around.
Check the weather and always be prepared for a hike in the mountains.

Search & Rescue is a game dedicated to all Good People, Search and Rescue Teams around the World and those who volounteer to help others, with special cheers for TOPR and GOPR! :)


IMPORTANT: Please keep in mind that "Search and Rescue" is only a game and should be treated only as such. It`s not a guide.
It`s created to build awareness but for specific and professional information and guidance about the safety reach to Your local Experts and SAR Teams.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04, Ubuntu 18.04, and CentOS 7
  • Processor: Intel® i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Vulkan capable
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04, Ubuntu 18.04, and CentOS 7
  • Processor: Intel® i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Vulkan capable
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: SEARCH AND RESCUE

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11 capable
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel® i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11 capable
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Turn-Based Strategy Board Game for up to 4 Players! Search, Rescue, Survive!
supported_languages: English, Polish, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Norwegian, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Turkish, Slovak, Arabic, Bulgarian, Greek, Hungarian, Indonesian, Japanese, Korean, Romanian, Simplified Chinese, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Ukrainian, Vietnamese, Croatian, Estonian, Georgian, Icelandic, Latvian, Lithuanian, Maori, Slovenian
